sentences.en: Attendance at primary school is obligatory.
Attendance at tonight's meeting is obligatory.
He felt Betrayed when he found the guests numerous, the food heavy , and the Ball obligatory.
sentences.cn: 当他发现众多的来宾, 过多的食物, 和非参加不可的舞会时,他感到上当受骗了.

sentences.en: It is obligatory for all employees to wear protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 所有员工必须穿防护服装。

sentences.en: It is obligatory for us to obey the laws.
It is obligatory to remove your shoes before entering.
Most women will be offered an ultrasound scan during pregnancy, although it's not obligatory.
sentences.cn: 大多数处于妊娠期的妇女将被建议接受超声波检查，不过这不是强制性的。

sentences.en: No sooner had we been installed than we were served the obligatory heavy meal.
sentences.cn: 我们刚刚安顿下来,就要我们去出席例行的盛大宴会.

sentences.en: She offered him the obligatory cup of tea.
sentences.cn: 她照例给他端来一杯茶。

sentences.en: The hostess was dressed very simply for a simple, perhaps obligatory occasion.
sentences.cn: 在这种简单的, 也许纯属义务性的场合,女主人的衣着十分朴素.

sentences.en: The mathematics is obligatory course inside the school.
sentences.cn: 数学是学校里的一门必修课.

sentences.en: The press conferences were almost obligatory.
sentences.cn: 这些新闻会议是不得已的.

sentences.en: The provision of your personal information in this form is obligatory.
sentences.cn: 你必须在本表格提供所需个人资料.

sentences.en: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.cn: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentences.en: These rates do not include the charge for obligatory medical consultations.
sentences.cn: 这些费用不含必要的就诊费。

sentences.en: WH - movement is obligatory in English. It changes sentence from affirmative to interrogative.
sentences.cn: 英语中WH移位对肯定句变疑问句是属于强制性的.

words.tran_cn: 有责任的，有义务的；必需的
必须的；感激的；有责任的
要求；约束；施恩惠（oblige的过去分词）
使负义务；强使，强迫；对…施以恩惠
[法]义务的；必须的；义不容辞的

trans.tran_cn: 必须的，应尽的，义务的，强制性的
trans.tran_en: something that is obligatory must be done because of a law, rule etc
